DataElement.preferredDefinition: A number used to identify the a node on the grid of supplies or apparatus used for cancer-related research, diagnosis or therapy.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Supplies or apparatus used for cancer-related research, diagnosis or therapy._The underlying services oriented architecture that supports caBIG. caGrid defines two types of "grid services" that can be registered as nodes on the grid: Data Services and Analytical Services. caGrid provides a standard infrastructure for bioinformaticians to advertise their services thru common metadata defined in Unified Modeling Language (UML) domain information model. caGrid infrastructure also provides strong semantic specification thru binding to description logic terminology concepts that can be used by users to discover new and interesting scientific information using semantically aware searches._One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing._An object needed to perform a diagnostic, therapeutic or research activity.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An object needed to perform a diagnostic, therapeutic or research activity.

Concepts.definition: A manufactured object that is used to perform diagnostic, therapeutic or research activities.

Property.preferredDefinition: The underlying services oriented architecture that supports caBIG. caGrid defines two types of "grid services" that can be registered as nodes on the grid: Data Services and Analytical Services. caGrid provides a standard infrastructure for bioinformaticians to advertise their services thru common metadata defined in Unified Modeling Language (UML) domain information model. caGrid infrastructure also provides strong semantic specification thru binding to description logic terminology concepts that can be used by users to discover new and interesting scientific information using semantically aware searches.:One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

Concepts.definition: The underlying services oriented architecture that supports caBIG. caGrid defines two types of "grid services" that can be registered as nodes on the grid: Data Services and Analytical Services. caGrid provides a standard infrastructure for bioinformaticians to advertise their services thru common metadata defined in Unified Modeling Language (UML) domain information model. caGrid infrastructure also provides strong semantic specification thru binding to description logic terminology concepts that can be used by users to discover new and interesting scientific information using semantically aware searches.
One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 6/30/09 updated DEC with C19238 - Diagnostic, Therapeutic, and Research Equipment as OC.  10/5/08 - added concept to clarify that this is the caGrid identifier; released post NCIA Interim Rpt Changes;  4/21/08 - removed "Kind" from long name to be consistent with other NCIA/DICOM DECs to promote reuse in load of IVI AIM model.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Generic value domain for a primitive java dataype that is an Integer (32-bit two's complement).

ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: 10.14.20 TL changed WFS from DRAFT NEW to RETIRED ARCHIVED and added an End Date in preparation of OneData.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

DataElement.changeDescription: 4/15/10 definition revised per Nov 2009 consensus for AIM 1.5 load.  6/30/09 - Equipment CUI changed per EVS direction; new DEC.  10/5/08 - added concept to clarify that this is the caGrid identifier; released post NCIA Interim Rpt Changes;  4/21/08 - removed "Kind" from long name to be consistent with other NCIA/DICOM Equipment CDEs to promote reuse in load of IVI AIM model.
